California residents have the right to request that we disclose what personal information we collect, use, and sell, as well as the right to request that we delete certain personal information that we have collected from you.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Right to know, right to request correction, and right to request deletion of information

 

California residents have the right to request that we disclose what personal information we collect, use, and sell, as well as the right to request that we delete certain personal information that we have collected from you.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: Right to know, right to request correction, and right to request deletion of information
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: If we hold personal information that is not accurate, California residents have the right to request that we correct this information.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: You or your authorized agent may submit a request to exercise your rights by visiting www.xfinity.com/privacy/requests or calling us at 1-844-963-0138.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: There may be information we will not return in response to your access request, such as information that would affect the privacy of others or interfere with legal requirements.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: Similarly, there may be reasons why we cannot comply with your deletion request, such as the need to keep your personal information to provide you service or to fulfill a legal obligation.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Right to restrict use of Sensitive Personal Information
 

California residents have the right to request that we restrict our use of Sensitive Personal Information.
Label: Description of Right to Limit use of PI

Text: You can limit our use and disclosure of your Sensitive Personal Information for personalized recommendations, marketing, and advertising purposes through the Xfinity Privacy Preferences Center.
Label: Methods to exercise rights
